AIS Library Source Documentation

The AIS Library Source Documentation consists of documentation for the classes included in the AIS Library. The AIS Library is subdivided into sub-libraries, one for each category of classes, such as basic classes and the GUI-dependent classes. These categories are patterned after the categories adopted by Trolltech in their QT library.

Not all of the AIS Library classes are needed in some applications. For example, batch-mode applications that do not depend upon a GUI (a graphical user-interface) do not depend upon those classes that generate GUI elements. The AIS Library is subdivided as follows:

AIS Core Classes
The core classes are:
  • AG
  • ASr
AIS GUI Classes
No GUI classes are currently implemented.
